2lovePage.what: Wake up and wake others up...
2lovePage.how: How: on this day, hour, minute and second, publish the text "... come, Lord Jesus!" in any social network
2lovePage.why: Why: to facilitate the awakening of the church as well as to draw the attention of those who have not yet thought about the coming of the last time

amoLinks.infomation: Here you can save your biblical references. Data is stored in browser memory
amoLinks.noLinksYet: This folder containd no links yet

amoSecondComingModal.answerTheQuestions: We need to honestly answer the questions:
amoSecondComingModal.q1: Do I allow the Holy Spirit to be in my heart, or has my own will already taken hold of me completely?
amoSecondComingModal.q2: Why can I really call myself a Christian, and is that so?
amoSecondComingModal.q3c: and do I perceive it as God has commanded it?
amoSecondComingModal.q4: Do I fulfill the requirements to stand on the right side to Christ, as described in the Gospel of Matthew?
amoSecondComingModal.q5: Am I filled with love, mercy, sacrifice, or am I driven by the desire to become a great spiritual leader?
amoSecondComingModal.q6: Is there a risk that I will persecute a church that doesn't seem like a God's to me?
amoSecondComingModal.q7: Is my action and desire really what Jesus wants, or is it from the evil one, but I do not recognize it?
